name: Dransportone
description:
Created in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021, with the theme Joined Together.

You control a drone that needs to deliver the package within the time limit shown. However, if you damage the drone too much, it breaks. Also, drones from other companies attempt to sabotage your delivery to give you bad customer reviews, so watch out for them. 

Watch for the surprises on Level 5 and 9...
